prime.signals.INotifier<FunctionSignature>

type
interface
extends
IUnbindable<FunctionSignature>
available in
swf
An INotifier calls message handlers of type that are registered using bind(). INotifier is Observable aswell.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

bindDisabled(owner : Dynamic, handler : FunctionSignature) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

bindOnce(owner : Dynamic, handler : FunctionSignature) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

observe(owner : Dynamic, handler : Void -> Void) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

observeDisabled(owner : Dynamic, handler : Void -> Void) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

observeOnce(owner : Dynamic, handler : Void -> Void) : Wire<FunctionSignature>

unbind(listener : Dynamic, ?handler : T) : Void

inherited from prime.signals.IUnbindable
parameters
listener Handler owner object
?handler Handler method. When handler == null, all methods owned by listener will be unbound.
Unbind all handlers for the given listener object, or when a handler != null: unbound that specific handler. FIXME: Should returns the number of handlers unbound.

unbindAll() : Void
